name: OCKChartViewSynchronizerProtocol
desc: A protocol that makes and updates views in a view synchronizer for charts.

items.name: func makeView() -> Self.View
items.desc: Creates a chart view that the view controller synchronizes.

items.name: func updateView(Self.View, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<[OCKDataSeries]>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
